title: Reset Password Request
description: Reset Password. Note: this call is NOT available when authenticated to a per-app token. It is only available for in-house Binary.com apps.

new_password.description: New password for validation (length within 6-25 chars, accepts any printable ASCII character)

verify_password.description: Verify new password (length within 6-25 chars, accepts any printable ASCII character)

verification_code.description: Email verification code (received from a verify_email call, which must be done first)

passthrough.description: Optional field, used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

req_id.description: Optional field to map request to response
